Articles.Content:
I've searched and I'm surprised not to find a sticky for this or something - what are all the bloody acronyms?

One I can't find is SQRT - what is that???

Thanks a lot!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T06:26:58Z" title="06/24/2015 06:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by Claw**
depends on context, but SQRT is often shorthand for Square Root.. as in the mathematical function.
Ok i feel dumb for asking that one.
The only dumb question is the one you don't ask.

It means that, while you were typing a response to a post, someone else posted first.

Especially if the person who posted first already answered the question.

It means that while you were typing a reply, somebody else typed the same thing and posted it before you did, so you get 2 posts in a row saying the same thing. I hope I get ninja'd while I'm typing this (I'm taking my time) to provide a good example.

EDIT: And it worked ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

Thanks guys! And yes, you did get ninja'd. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T02:14:08Z" title="06/19/2015 02:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by legoclone09**
  
:khappy: is for steam, not the forums!
